settings.desc__cont:
• Excellent for Thinning Hair
  • Zero risk, 100 Day Money-Back Guarantee
  • For both Women and Men
  • For ALL hair types. Color-safe and, gentle enough for daily use
  • 100% Drug Free
  • Clean & Super Natural Formula: Almost every single Ingredient Ranks #1 on the coveted EWG Skin Deep database: the Authority for Clean Beauty
  • Free From: Artificial Colors, Artificial Fragrance, Artificial Preservatives, Sulfates, Silicone, Parabens, Phthalates, and Gluten
  • Contains Only Certified Natural (CN) Fragrance
  • Certified Cruelty Free: With No Animal Testing
  • Certified Vegan: With No Animal Derived Ingredients
  • Made In the USA and ships from the USA
  • Recyclable bottle & cap
settings.dire__cont:
Shampoo

STEP 1: Apply to wet hair from root to tip and work into a lather. Gently massage into scalp with fingertips. Leave in for up to 3 minutes, then rinse. STEP 2: REPEAT STEP 1 above for full effect & best results. STEP 3: Condition with companion Tru Bloom Hair Growth Conditioner. NOTE: Avoid product contact with eyes. If In Eyes: rinse with cool water for several minutes.

Conditioner

After Shampooing twice with Tru Bloom Hair Growth Shampoo, apply Conditioner to wet hair from root to tip. Gently massage into scalp with fingertips. Leave in for up to 5 minutes, then rinse. NOTE: Avoid product contact with eyes. If In Eyes: rinse with cool water for several minutes.
settings.ingr__cont:
Shampoo

Aqua (Purified Water), Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Coco Betaine, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Cocamide MEA, Sodium Lauryl Sarcosinate, Apple Cider Vinegar, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Water), Peppermint Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Cetrimonium Chloride, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Kakadu Plum Extract, Green Tea Extract, Hibiscus Flower Extract, Amla Fruit Extract, Bhringraj Extract, Horsetail Extract, Lindera Strychnifolia Root Extract, Red Ginseng Extract, Aloe Leaf Juice, Saw Palmetto Extract, Red Algae Extract, Maltodextrin, Biotin (Vitamin B7), Panthenol (Vitamin B5), MSM (Methyl Sulfonyl Methane), Caffeine, Vitamin E, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Lecithin, Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Citric Acid, Certified Natural (CN) Fragrance, Geogard® Ultra (Natural Preservative).

Conditioner

Aqua (Purified Water), Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Apple Cider Vinegar, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut Water), Dipentaerythrityl Hexa C5 9 Acid Esters, Stearyl Alcohol, Dicetyldimonium Chloride, Peppermint Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Kakadu Plum Extract, Green Tea Extract, Hibiscus Flower Extract, Amla Fruit Extract, Bhringraj Extract, Horsetail Extract, Lindera Strychnifolia Root Extract, Red Ginseng Extract, Saw Palmetto Extract, Aloe Leaf Juice, Red Algae Extract, Maltodextrin, Biotin (Vitamin B7), Panthenol (Vitamin B5), MSM (Methyl Sulfonyl Methane), Caffeine, Vitamin E, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Hydroxyethyl Cellulose, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Trisodium Ethydiamine Dissuccinate, Lecithin, Certified Natural (CN) Fragrance, Geogard® Ultra (Natural Preservative).
